issue.title: Formatter fallback methods for very big numbers

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

issue.body:
| Q             | A
| ------------- | ---
| Is bugfix?    | yes
| New feature?  | no
| Breaks BC?    | no
| Tests pass?   | yes
| Fixed issues  | #14950

This one is tricky and I'm not sure if you want it that way.

I couldn't find any reliable way to check when normalized value are mispresented because of internal casting, floating point numbers presentation or precision configuration of PHP but my tests show that comparing normalized value to original one as strings gives a pretty good hint that final output may be broken.

Unfortunately internal casting of very big numbers can't be fixed even with fallback methods since the original value is already corrupted when passed to the method. That is why I've added hint in phpdoc to pass numbers as strings in case of very big ones.

I've added more tests for other formatters to see if these are subjects to the same issue and yes, `integer`, `percent` and `currency` needed to be fixed as well.

Strictly `intl` formatters are basically fine except `ordinal` where I've added phpdoc warning for v. big numbers (it should not be used with them anyway).

issue.title: asDecimal delimiter inconsistency

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

issue.body:
### What steps will reproduce the problem?

1.  Make sure php intl is installed
2. Set your app's language to a language which uses comma as decimal delimiter (e.g. German)
3.

`echo Yii::$app->formatter->asDecimal("0.026199999999999998", 4);`

result: 0.0262

`echo Yii::$app->formatter->asDecimal("0.026199999999999", 4);`

result: 0,0262

As you can see "asDecimal" gets inconsistent with the delimiter as soon the decimal places exceed 15.

### What is the expected result?

0,0262

### What do you get instead?

0.0262

### Additional info

| Q                | A
| ---------------- | ---
| Yii version      | 2.0.21
| PHP version      |  7.1
| Operating system | Debian Stretch
